reviewText: This video is very informative about who David Berkowitz was in the 70's. It is especially enlightning for anyone wondering about the occult. I guess I was hoping it would share more about David's life today. For anyone interested in who David Berkowitz is today go to AriseandShine.com

This video is not really like Maury Terry's book like the other guy said. It does not go into everything or even 10% of what Maury goes into. I reccomend you get the book "The Ultimate Evil" by Maury Terry at BN.com.
Just the best I've ever see
